item.title: How to extend the Ubuntu guest OS's hard disk for VirtualBox on Mac
item.description:
How to extend the Ubuntu guest OS’s hard disk for VirtualBox on Mac

Steps:

  • resize the VDI file on Mac OS: How to Resize a VirtualBox VDI or VHD File on Mac OS X

  • boot the Ubuntu with the image(ISO) and Gparted(resize the partition).

    Note: firstly resize the extension partition (/dev/sda2), then resize the partition (/dev/sda5)

    Ubuntu VM in VirtualBox: How to increase the size of a disk and make small(er) exports for distribution

  • reboot the ubuntu with local vdi file and check the result.
